allEyesOnMe.name: All Eyes On Me
allEyesOnMe.description: Ever dreamed of being the star of your own personal flash mob? "All Eyes On Me" is the spell for you! As a charm bard's secret weapon, this incantation turns you into a one-person show-stopper.
allEyesOnMe.effect: Forces all creatures within line of sight to focus their attention on the caster. The effectiveness of the spell increases with the quality of the caster's singing.
allEyesOnMe.castingTime: The duration of the song (minimum 6 seconds)
allEyesOnMe.abilityPointCost: 0 AP (does not cost mana to cast)

scaling.level 5: Affects targets even if they can't hear the caster (lip-reading counts!)
scaling.level 10: Targets find it difficult to look away or focus on anything else
scaling.level 15: Targets are compelled to join in, creating a spontaneous musical number

veil of Temptation.name: Veil of Temptation
veil of Temptation.description: The Succubus conjures a powerful illusion that not only taps into the deepest desires of her targets but also traps their souls in a dream-like state, leaving their bodies vulnerable to manipulation.
veil of Temptation.effect: All creatures within range must make a Charisma saving throw or become incapacitated, trapped in an illusion of their greatest desires. While under the spell’s effect, they cannot perceive reality and are vulnerable to any form of attack or manipulation. For each minute the targets remain under this effect, they take 1d8 psychic damage as their minds are overwhelmed by the illusion. WARNING: Each use of Veil of Temptation causes the Succubus to experience a momentary loss of control over her powers. For every target affected, she must succeed on a DC 15 Wit saving throw or lose a core memory. If more than three targets are affected, the Succubus also loses half of her current HP immediately after casting.

scaling.level 1: Affects one target. Must succeed on a DC 15 Witsaving throw or become incapacitated and take 1d8 psychic damage per minute.
scaling.level 3: DC increases to 17; affects up to two targets within range.
scaling.level 5: DC increases to 19; duration of incapacitation extends to 2 minutes per failed save.
scaling.level 7: DC increases to 21; affects up to three targets; psychic damage increases to 2d8 per minute.
scaling.level 9: Affects up to four targets; duration extends to 5 minutes per failed save.
scaling.level 10: DC increases to 23; psychic damage increases to 3d8 per minute.
scaling.level 13: Affects up to five targets; illusion becomes so real that targets are also considered Paralyzed for the duration.
scaling.level 15: DC increases to 25; psychic damage increases to 4d8 per minute; affects all creatures within a 30-foot radius.
scaling.level 17: Targets under the spell’s effect can be commanded to perform one simple action during their hallucination (requires concentration).
scaling.level 19: Duration extends to 10 minutes per failed save; psychic damage increases to 5d8 per minute.
scaling.level 20: The illusion is so powerful that if a target remains under its effect for the full duration, they must succeed on a second DC 25 Wisdom saving throw or fall into a permanent catatonic state. Additionally, the Succubus becomes weakened (losing half of her maximum HP) for 24 hours after using this spell.

bewitching Kiss.name: Bewitching Kiss
bewitching Kiss.description: A dangerously seductive kiss that enchants the target, bending their will to the Succubus.
bewitching Kiss.effect: Target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by the Succubus for a short duration. While charmed, the target considers the Succubus a trusted ally.

scaling.level 1: Target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute.
scaling.level 3: Increase DC to 15 and duration to 2 minutes.
scaling.level 5: Can target one additional creature within 5 feet of the Succubus.
scaling.level 9: DC increases to 18, and the spell can target two additional creatures within 10 feet.
scaling.level 10: Targets are charmed for 10 minutes and have disadvantage on Wisdom saving throws against suggestions.
scaling.level 13: DC increases to 20, and the spell can affect targets up to 15 feet away.
scaling.level 15: Duration increases to 15 minutes, and the spell can target three additional creatures.
scaling.level 17: DC increases to 22, and charmed targets are also compelled to protect the Succubus.
scaling.level 19: The spell can affect any creature within a 20-foot radius.
scaling.level 20: Targets are charmed for 30 minutes, and their first attempt to break free is made with disadvantage.

astralPaw.name: Astral Paw
astralPaw.description: Ever wished you could reach that cookie jar on the top shelf without getting off the couch? Well, now you can! Astral Paw conjures a spectral appendage that's part ghostly hand, part feline fury.
astralPaw.effect: Summons a spectral paw that can manipulate objects at a distance. The paw can be used to interact with items, attack enemies, or perform simple tasks.
astralPaw.range: 10 meters at level 1, increasing with spell level

scaling.level 5: Paw can grow claws, increasing damage to 2d6 + Spellcasting Modifier
scaling.level 10: Paw can be made much larger, increasing range to 20 meters and damage to 3d6 + Spellcasting Modifier
scaling.level 15: Caster's skills and abilities are translated directly into the paw, allowing for more complex manipulations and increasing damage to 4d6 + Spellcasting Modifier

badAttitude.name: Bad Attitude
badAttitude.description: Ever met someone so grumpy they could curdle milk with a glance? Well, now you can be that someone! "Bad Attitude" is like weaponized teen angst mixed with a sprinkle of DMV employee frustration.
badAttitude.effect: Lowers the target's intelligence and resistance to other effects. Similar to the fear spell, but targets mental faculties instead of physical abilities.

scaling.level 5: Affects multiple targets in a 15-foot radius
scaling.level 10: Also reduces target's Wit and Charisma
scaling.level 15: Creates an aura of negativity, affecting all enemies who enter within 10 feet of the caster

thunderStomp.name: Thunder Stomp
thunderStomp.description: Ever feel like knocking everyone on their asses just because you can? Thunder Stomp is like dropping a divine "Fuck you!" to gravity and decorum, shaking the ground so hard it sends everyone scurrying like rats in a rave.
thunderStomp.effect: The caster slams the ground, creating a shockwave in a 10-foot radius. Enemies must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

scaling.level 5: Radius increases to 15 feet.
scaling.level 10: Also stuns enemies for 1 round.
scaling.level 15: Radius increases to 20 feet.
scaling.level 20: Enemies within the radius are also disarmed.

beastialRoar.name: Beastial Roar
beastialRoar.description: Need to scare the absolute shit out of everyone around you? Unleash a Beastial Roar and watch your enemies shit bricks in terror. It's less of a battle tactic and more of a personal amusement.
beastialRoar.effect: Roars so terrifyingly loud, enemies within 15 feet must make a Wit saving throw or become frightened for 1 round.

scaling.level 5: Range increases to 20 feet.
scaling.level 10: Also reduces enemy attack rolls for 1 round.
scaling.level 15: Range increases to 25 feet.
scaling.level 20: Enemies are also paralyzed with fear for 1 round.

bloodFury.name: Blood Fury
bloodFury.description: Nearly dead and surrounded by assholes? Blood Fury turns your pain into their fucking nightmare. As you bleed, they'll wish they'd chosen a safer job—like bomb testing.
bloodFury.effect: Transforms every wound into increased damage output. Gain a +1 to damage rolls for each 5% of health missing.

scaling.level 5: Bonus to damage rolls increases by +2.
scaling.level 10: Also recover 1 hit point per successful attack.
scaling.level 15: Bonus to damage rolls increases by +3.
scaling.level 20: Gain temporary hit points equal to damage dealt on critical hits.

sirensCall.name: Siren's Call
sirensCall.description: Want to fuck up the enemy's formation with just your voice? Siren's Call isn't just enchanting; it's a mind-fucking melody that lures idiots to their demise. Who knew death could be so lyrical?
sirensCall.effect: Charms enemies within 20 feet who hear the melody, causing them to move towards you without regard for their safety for 1 round.

scaling.level 5: Range increases to 25 feet.
scaling.level 10: Duration increases to 2 rounds.
scaling.level 15: Range increases to 30 feet.
scaling.level 20: Charmed enemies also perform a minor task for the caster.

echoesofLore.name: Echoes of Lore
echoesofLore.description: Tired of your allies being as useful as a chocolate teapot? Echoes of Lore boosts their brains and brawn—because let’s face it, you can’t do all the thinking.
echoesofLore.effect: Grants all allies within 30 feet a +1 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

scaling.level 5: Bonus increases to +2.
scaling.level 10: Also grants resistance to psychic damage.
scaling.level 15: Bonus increases to +3.
scaling.level 20: All allies within range also gain a +1 bonus to damage rolls.

harmonicShield.name: Harmonic Shield
harmonicShield.description: Think a tune can't save your ass? Harmonic Shield turns your music into a shield—because sometimes, the best defense is not listening to anyone's bullshit.
harmonicShield.effect: Creates a sound barrier around you and your allies within 10 feet, granting a +2 bonus to AC for 1 round.

scaling.level 5: Range and bonus to AC increase to 15 feet and +3.
scaling.level 10: Duration increases to 2 rounds.
scaling.level 15: Range and bonus to AC increase to 20 feet and +4.
scaling.level 20: The shield also reflects magical spells back at the caster.

sanctuarySigil.name: Sanctuary Sigil
sanctuarySigil.description: Need a quick holy "Nope!" zone in the middle of a clusterfuck? Drop a Sanctuary Sigil and watch as divine power gives your enemies the celestial finger.
sanctuarySigil.effect: Conjures a sacred zone with a radius of 15 feet. Allies in the zone regain hit points each turn, while enemies take radiant damage.

scaling.level 5: Healing and damage increase by 1d10.
scaling.level 10: Radius increases to 20 feet.
scaling.level 15: Healing and damage increase by another 1d10.
scaling.level 20: Also provides immunity to charm and fear effects within the zone.

lightofRedemption.name: Light of Redemption
lightofRedemption.description: Want to blind your enemies with your righteousness? Light of Redemption is like flipping on the sun to highlight the assholes. Burn, baby, burn.
lightofRedemption.effect: Shines a painfully bright light in a 20-foot radius. Enemies must make a Stamina saving throw or be blinded for 1 round and take 1d6 radiant damage.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 2d6.
scaling.level 10: Range increases to 25 feet.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 3d6.
scaling.level 20: Blinded enemies also lose their ability to hear for the duration.

wrathoftheDivine.name: Wrath of the Divine
wrathoftheDivine.description: Need to smite someone so hard their ancestors feel it? Wrath of the Divine is your go-to divine nuke for when subtlety just isn’t your style.
wrathoftheDivine.effect: Calls down a pillar of holy fire in a 5-foot radius, dealing 2d8 radiant damage to all enemies in the area.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 3d8.
scaling.level 10: Radius increases to 10 feet.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 4d8.
scaling.level 20: Also causes enemies to be frightened for 1 round.

windwalkersGrace.name: Windwalker’s Grace
windwalkersGrace.description: Remember that time you tried to dodge your responsibilities and failed miserably? Windwalker's Grace is your second chance, letting you float past your problems like they’re your ex at a party.
windwalkersGrace.effect: Grants enhanced agility, allowing you to dodge the next two attacks against you.

scaling.level 5: Duration increases to allow dodging the next three attacks.
scaling.level 10: Also grants a +1 bonus to all saving throws.
scaling.level 15: Duration increases to allow dodging the next four attacks.
scaling.level 20: Also grants invisibility for 1 round after dodging.

circleofTranquility.name: Circle of Tranquility
circleofTranquility.description: Circle of Tranquility is like that deep breath you take before telling your family you’ve dropped out to become a mime. It calms everyone down, except this time, it actually works.
circleofTranquility.effect: Creates a 20-foot radius zone where all aggressive actions are suppressed, and allies gain regeneration of 1d4 hit points per round.

scaling.level 5: Radius increases to 25 feet.
scaling.level 10: Regeneration increases to 1d6.
scaling.level 15: Radius increases to 30 feet.
scaling.level 20: Also silences all hostile spells within the area.

fistofReckoning.name: Fist of Reckoning
fistofReckoning.description: Ever wanted to punch some sense into someone? Fist of Reckoning lets you hit with the existential despair of turning 30 and realizing your best years might be behind you.
fistofReckoning.effect: Delivers a powerful strike that deals 2d6 bludgeoning damage and may stun the target for 1 round if they fail a Stamina saving throw.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 3d6.
scaling.level 10: Also grants the monk a temporary shield absorbing 10 hit points.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 4d6.
scaling.level 20: If the target is knocked out by this attack, the monk gains a bonus action.

naturesBounty.name: Nature’s Bounty
naturesBounty.description: Nature’s Bounty is like finally winning something valuable—a magical influx of supplies that feel as nourishing as seeing your sibling get scolded for something you did.
naturesBounty.effect: Conjures enough food and water to sustain up to 5 people for one day, and provides a temporary +1 bonus to health regeneration for 24 hours.

scaling.level 5: Sustains up to 10 people.
scaling.level 10: Bonus to health regeneration increases to +2.
scaling.level 15: Sustains up to 15 people.
scaling.level 20: Also boosts morale, giving all sustained an advantage on their next skill check.

predatorsGaze.name: Predator’s Gaze
predatorsGaze.description: Predator’s Gaze gives you the eyesight of an eagle, perfect for spotting opportunities or realizing that your high school sweetheart really did downgrade.
predatorsGaze.effect: Sharpens your senses, granting you advantage on perception checks and first strike capability in combat for the next 3 rounds.

scaling.level 5: Also grants the ability to see in low light.
scaling.level 10: Duration increases to 5 rounds.
scaling.level 15: Also grants the ability to track magical auras.
scaling.level 20: Grants a perfect recall of anything seen during the effect.

veiloftheWild.name: Veil of the Wild
veiloftheWild.description: Veil of the Wild is like that time you thought you could dye your hair at home—it hides you, but this time you won’t need a hat for weeks afterward.
veiloftheWild.effect: Blends you into your surroundings, granting invisibility until you attack or cast another spell.

scaling.level 5: Also mutes sound around the caster.
scaling.level 10: Duration of invisibility extends to two rounds after attacking.
scaling.level 15: Also masks magical and heat signatures.
scaling.level 20: Renders caster undetectable by divination magic for the duration.

honeyTrapofDespondence.name: Honey Trap of Despondence
honeyTrapofDespondence.description: Inspired by the gloomy days of our favorite bear when all the honey’s gone, Honey Trap of Despondence makes your enemies feel the emptiness of an unfulfilled dream—like finally catching up on your DVR recordings only to find out your show’s been canceled.
honeyTrapofDespondence.effect: Conjures a sticky, honey-like substance in a 10-foot radius that slows enemy movement by 50% and reduces their attack speed for 3 rounds.

scaling.level 5: Slow effect increases to 60%.
scaling.level 10: Duration increases to 5 rounds.
scaling.level 15: Slow effect increases to 70%.
scaling.level 20: Also causes enemies to take minor psychic damage each round as despair sets in.

bangBro.name: Bang Bro
bangBro.description: Who says you can't bring the Fourth of July to a sword fight? Bang Bro is like giving your weapon a Taco Bell value meal and a gallon of energy drink.
bangBro.effect: Temporarily enchants an equipped item with both fire and electrical damage. Can inflict Burn and Shock status effects on targets.
bangBro.damage: Additional 1d6 fire damage and 1d6 lightning damage

scaling.level 5: Increased damage (2d6 fire, 2d6 lightning) and higher chance to inflict status effects
scaling.level 10: Can enchant two items simultaneously
scaling.level 15: Adds chain lightning effect to electrical damage

bitch,What.name: Bitch, What?
bitch,What.description: You ever seen an angry, on-fire weasel tossed into a room full of chickens? You catch on fire. You are invulnerable to blunt damage. Then you get really angry and kill every goddamn thing in the room.
bitch,What.effect: Caster bursts into flames, becomes invulnerable to blunt damage, and enters a berserk state, attacking everything in sight.
bitch,What.damage: 3d10 fire damage to all creatures within 5 feet

scaling.level 5: Increase duration to 30 seconds
scaling.level 10: Add 2d10 force damage to attacks while berserk
scaling.level 15: Extend invulnerability to piercing damage

blackNimbus.name: Black Nimbus
blackNimbus.description: Has the same effect as wearing a shirt for the band Cattle Decapitation to church. Instantly removes target from the blessing of their deity and all associated buffs and effects.
blackNimbus.effect: Removes divine blessings and buffs from the target, prevents them from entering sacred spaces, and may invoke divine punishment.

scaling.level 5: Increase duration by 50%
scaling.level 10: Affect multiple targets within a 15-foot radius
scaling.level 15: 25% chance to invoke immediate divine smite

bookBurner.name: Book Burner
bookBurner.description: Ever wanted to be the ultimate party pooper at a wizard's convention? Book Burner is like a magical eraser for the mind, wiping away spells faster than a teenager clears their browser history when mom walks in.
bookBurner.effect: Forces an opponent to forget a specific spell for a period of time.

scaling.level 5: Can target spells up to 2 levels higher than the caster
scaling.level 10: Duration increases to 48 hours
scaling.level 15: Can make the target forget two spells simultaneously

brainDreeze.name: Brain Dreeze
brainDreeze.description: Ever chugged a slushie too fast and felt that icy pain shoot through your skull? Now you can inflict that joy on your enemies!
brainDreeze.effect: Drains the target's health and potentially causes temporary blindness at higher levels.

scaling.level 5: Increase damage to 3d8 and adds a slowing effect
scaling.level 10: 50% chance to cause blindness for 1 round
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 4d8 and blindness chance increases to 75%

butchersMasquerade.name: Butcher's Masquerade
butchersMasquerade.description: Ever tried to host a dinner party for your sworn enemies? The Butcher's Masquerade is like the ultimate cosmic mixer, where the guest list is curated by a mischievous deity with a twisted sense of humor.
butchersMasquerade.effect: Creates a supernatural party with a divinely enforced peace agreement. Attendees cannot harm each other unless in self-defense. If the party concludes peacefully, all guests receive a boon from Apito. If the peace is broken, the offender is fed to the Nothing.
butchersMasquerade.range: Affects an entire area (size determined by caster's level)
butchersMasquerade.damage: N/A (but breaking the rules results in obliteration)
butchersMasquerade.cooldown: Can only be cast once in a lifetime

scaling.level 5: Increase area of effect and number of guests
scaling.level 10: Add magical entertainment that boosts the chance of peace
scaling.level 15: Extend duration to 48 hours and add cosmic catering

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: Ever wished you could just disappear during awkward social situations? Camouflage is like the magical version of hiding behind a potted plant at a party, but way more effective.
camouflage.effect: Conceals the caster's dot on the Minimap as long as they remain stationary.

scaling.level 5: Caster can make small movements without breaking the effect
scaling.level 10: Extends concealment to a 5-foot radius around the caster
scaling.level 15: Allows the caster to move at half speed while maintaining the effect

clockworkTriplicate.name: Clockwork Triplicate
clockworkTriplicate.description: Ever wanted to be in three places at once? Clockwork Triplicate is like the magical version of copy-and-paste, but for people!
clockworkTriplicate.effect: Creates two independent duplicates of the caster that act autonomously.
clockworkTriplicate.damage: Minor damage from exploding replicas if spell ends prematurely

scaling.level 5: Duration increases to 2 minutes per spell level
scaling.level 10: Replicas can cast spells known by the caster
scaling.level 15: Replicas gain 50% of the caster's hit points

cloudofExhaust.name: Cloud of Exhaust
cloudofExhaust.description: Ever wondered what it would be like to weaponize that feeling you get after eating a triple bean burrito? Cloud of Exhaust is like a magical dutch oven, filling the air with a noxious cloud that would make even a skunk hold its nose.
cloudofExhaust.effect: Creates a noxious cloud that knocks out targets and makes them vulnerable to follow-up attacks.
cloudofExhaust.range: 30-foot radius centered on a point within 60 feet
cloudofExhaust.damage: No initial damage, but subsequent attacks deal an extra 1d6 damage for 30 seconds

scaling.level 5: Increase radius to 40 feet
scaling.level 10: Targets remain vulnerable for 1 minute after waking
scaling.level 15: Cloud becomes mobile, following caster's mental commands

communityPool.name: Community Pool
communityPool.description: Ever wished you could share your nasty cold with that annoying coworker? Community Pool is like a magical game of hot potato, but instead of a spud, you're passing around that weird rash you got from sitting on a public toilet.
communityPool.effect: Transfers an infection or condition from one target to another.

scaling.level 5: Can transfer beneficial conditions as well
scaling.level 10: Can affect targets up to 5 feet away
scaling.level 15: Can transfer multiple conditions at once

confusingFog.name: Confusing Fog
confusingFog.description: Ever wanted to recreate the experience of trying to find your car in a parking garage, but in combat? Confusing Fog is like a magical vape pen for the battlefield, filling the air with a thick, wet mist that would make London jealous.
confusingFog.effect: Creates a thick, disorienting fog that blinds enemies but allows allies to see through it.
confusingFog.range: 30-foot radius centered on a point within 60 feet

scaling.level 5: Increase radius to 40 feet
scaling.level 10: Fog becomes mildly acidic, dealing 1d4 acid damage per round to enemies
scaling.level 15: Duration increases to Intelligence x 10 seconds

disrupter.name: Disrupter
disrupter.description: Ever wanted to be the magical equivalent of a bull in a china shop? Disrupter is like a mystical wrecking ball, perfect for when subtlety is overrated and you just want to make things go boom.
disrupter.effect: Fires a powerful energy bolt that causes significant damage and has a chance to stun targets.

scaling.level 5: Increase range to 45 feet and damage to 4d10
scaling.level 10: Add 2d6 thunder damage and increase stun chance to 25%
scaling.level 15: Bolt can pierce through up to 3 targets in a line

fear.name: Fear
fear.description: Ever wanted to be the living embodiment of that creepy clown from your childhood nightmares? Fear is like a magical horror movie marathon injected directly into your enemy's brain.
fear.effect: Instills overwhelming fear in the target, causing them to flee or become paralyzed with terror.

scaling.level 5: Affects groups of enemies in a 15-foot radius
scaling.level 10: 2% chance to paralyze the target
scaling.level 15: Can be cast on a wide area, affecting all enemies within 30 feet

fireFingers.name: Fire Fingers
fireFingers.description: Ever wanted to be a human flamethrower without the bulky equipment? Fire Fingers is like having a portable BBQ at your fingertips - literally!
fireFingers.effect: Allows the caster to shoot fire from their fingertips or ignite their fingers for melee combat.

scaling.level 5: Increase damage to 3d6 and range to 40 feet
scaling.level 10: Can ignite objects at a distance
scaling.level 15: Create a continuous stream of fire (4d6 damage per round)

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description: Ah, the classic Fireball - for when you absolutely, positively need to roast everything in the room. It's like a magical microwave for your enemies, but instead of a gentle 'ding', you get a glorious 'BOOM!'
fireball.effect: Hurls a slow-moving orb of fire that explodes on impact, damaging all creatures in the area.

scaling.level 5: Increase damage to 10d6 and radius to 30 feet
scaling.level 10: Orb leaves a trail of fire that lasts for 1 round
scaling.level 15: Can be set to explode on a timer or specific trigger

getOutofJail.name: Get Out of Jail
getOutofJail.description: Feeling a bit stuck? Paralyzed with indecision (or, you know, actual paralysis)? Get Out of Jail is like a magical "Get Out of Jail Free" card, but instead of Monopoly, you're playing "Don't Get Eaten by the Monster."
getOutofJail.effect: Instantly removes the stunned condition from the target.

scaling.level 5: Can target a creature up to 30 feet away
scaling.level 10: Also removes the paralyzed and restrained conditions
scaling.level 15: Can affect all allies within a 15-foot radius

graupel.name: Graupel
graupel.description: Ever wanted to combine the joy of a snowball fight with the destruction of a hailstorm? Graupel is like ordering a snow cone from Thor himself!
graupel.effect: Summons a massive hailstorm that pelts the area with fist-sized ice chunks, damaging and potentially stunning targets.

scaling.level 5: Increase damage to 8d8 and add difficult terrain due to ice buildup
scaling.level 10: Storm becomes electrically charged, adding 2d6 lightning damage
scaling.level 16: Storm becomes deafening and obscures vision, imposing disadvantage on all rolls for non-allies in the area

hanzo.name: Hanzo
hanzo.description: Ever wished you could be a human magnet, but only for your enemies? Hanzo is like having your own personal tractor beam, except instead of tractors, you're beaming in angry monsters!
hanzo.effect: Pulls targeted creatures towards the caster with an irresistible force.

scaling.level 5: Can target up to 3 creatures at once
scaling.level 10: Increase range to 90 feet and damage to 2d6
scaling.level 15: Creatures pulled take additional 2d6 force damage and are stunned for 1 round

hastenPoison.name: Hasten Poison
hastenPoison.description: Ever felt like waiting for poison to take effect is just too darn slow? Hasten Poison is like hitting the fast-forward button on your favorite venomous concoction.
hastenPoison.effect: Accelerates and intensifies the effects of poisons on the target.
hastenPoison.damage: Doubles poison damage for the next minute

scaling.level 5: Can affect poisons on targets up to 30 feet away
scaling.level 10: Triples poison damage instead of doubling
scaling.level 15: Also applies the poisoned condition if not already present

healCritter.name: Heal Critter
healCritter.description: Got a pet that's more "ouch" than "meow"? Heal Critter is like a magical band-aid for your furry (or scaly, or slimy) friends!
healCritter.effect: Instantly heals a pet-class mob or dungeon familiar.
healCritter.abilityPointCost: 2 AP (0 if cast from a scroll)

scaling.level 5: Increase healing to 3d8 + spellcasting modifier
scaling.level 10: Can target a critter up to 30 feet away
scaling.level 15: Also removes one negative condition (poisoned, paralyzed, etc.)

hole.name: Hole
hole.description: Ever wanted to be a human Swiss cheese maker, but for walls? Hole is like having a magical hole punch that works on anything!
hole.effect: Creates a temporary cylindrical hole in any surface.
hole.damage: N/A (but can be used for "portal cuts" on enemies)
hole.abilityPointCost: Variable (1 AP per second of duration)

scaling.level 5: Can adjust hole diameter at will
scaling.level 10: Can create non-cylindrical shapes
scaling.level 15: Can create holes in magical or reinforced surfaces

iNeedMyPersonalSpace.name: I Need My Personal Space
iNeedMyPersonalSpace.description: Ever been stuck in a crowded elevator with a bunch of sweaty orcs? "I Need My Personal Space" is like a magical forcefield for the socially anxious!
iNeedMyPersonalSpace.effect: Creates a powerful shockwave that pushes all creatures away from the caster.

scaling.level 5: Increase radius to 20 feet and damage to 3d6
scaling.level 10: Knocked-back creatures are also stunned for 1 round
scaling.level 15: Caster can choose to exclude certain targets from the effect

inkMarauder.name: Ink Marauder
inkMarauder.description: Ever wished your doodles could come to life and do your bidding? Ink Marauder is like having a magical photocopier that spits out minions instead of TPS reports!
inkMarauder.effect: Brings drawn creatures to life as Blood and Ink Elementals to serve the caster.
inkMarauder.damage: Varies based on the created elemental

scaling.level 5: Can create multiple elementals at once
scaling.level 10: Elementals gain resistance to non-magical weapons
scaling.level 15: Can create 3D, fully-realized versions of drawn creatures

laundryDay.name: Laundry Day
laundryDay.description: There are a lot of angry souls out there. Like, a lot. It's said if one has the ability to actually see all the wailing souls that filter through the edges of our world, one would go quite insane.
laundryDay.effect: Animates recently unequipped armor or weapons with angry spirits, turning them into temporary minions.
laundryDay.damage: Varies based on the animated item

scaling.level 5: Can animate multiple items at once
scaling.level 10: Animated items gain resistances based on their material
scaling.level 15: Can animate items worn or wielded by enemies

magicMissile.name: Magic Missile
magicMissile.description: Who needs accuracy when you can have glowing, heat-seeking lasers of doom? Magic Missile is like having a bunch of tiny, overenthusiastic fireflies with a vendetta.
magicMissile.effect: Fires multiple homing energy bolts from the caster's eyes.

scaling.level 5: Can choose AP cost (3-6) to determine number of missiles
scaling.level 10: 25% chance to set targets on fire (1d4 fire damage per round)
scaling.level 15: Missiles can ricochet to hit additional targets

minionArmy.name: Minion Army
minionArmy.description: Ever dreamed of having your own personal flash mob, but for evil? Minion Army is like hosting a "Villains Anonymous" meeting and then convincing everyone to join your multi-level marketing scheme!
minionArmy.effect: Turns nearby intelligent monsters into temporary allies.
minionArmy.range: 30 meter diameter circle centered on the caster

scaling.level 5: Increase affected area and conversion chance
scaling.level 10: Minions gain a strength boost while under your control
scaling.level 15: Can affect higher-level creatures with increased success rate

mute.name: Mute
mute.description: Ever wished you could hit the mute button on that one person who just won't stop talking? Mute is like a magical roll of duct tape for your enemy's mouth!
mute.effect: Prevents the target from casting spells or using verbal abilities.

scaling.level 5: Increase duration to 2 minutes
scaling.level 10: Can target multiple creatures within range
scaling.level 15: Also prevents the target from making any sound at all

ping.name: Ping
ping.description: Also known as, "Here piggy, piggy," or "The Night Dread," Ping is a hunting and artillery-aiming tool for those who do not care if their quarry knows they're coming.
ping.effect: Reveals the location of creatures within a large area around the caster.
ping.range: 1 kilometer + 500 meters per 10 points of Intelligence

scaling.level 5: Provides more detailed information about detected creatures
scaling.level 10: Can distinguish between friend and foe
scaling.level 15: Can detect invisible or hidden creatures

protectiveShell.name: Protective Shell
protectiveShell.description: Picture yourself in high school. Now picture all the girls who would never get anywhere near you. It's kind of like that, but on purpose.
protectiveShell.effect: Creates a stationary sphere that blocks physical attacks and creatures.

scaling.level 5: Increase duration to 10 seconds + 1 second per spell level
scaling.level 10: Shell also blocks non-magical projectiles
scaling.level 15: Can move the shell at half your movement speed

puddleJumper.name: Puddle Jumper
puddleJumper.description: Ever wanted to make a dramatic exit without having to walk all the way to the door? Puddle Jumper is like having a personal "Nope!" button for awkward situations.
puddleJumper.effect: Teleports the caster and up to three others to a visible surface.
puddleJumper.range: Line of sight (distance increases with level)

scaling.level 5: Reduce casting delay to 5 seconds
scaling.level 10: Can teleport up to six creatures
scaling.level 15: No delay on teleportation

reverseGravity.name: Reverse Gravity
reverseGravity.description: Ever wanted to turn the world upside down, literally? Reverse Gravity is like playing "The Floor is Lava," except the ceiling is lava, and also the new floor.
reverseGravity.effect: Reverses gravity in a limited area, causing creatures and objects to fall upwards.

scaling.level 5: Increase affected area to 75-foot cube
scaling.level 10: Can selectively choose which objects are affected
scaling.level 15: Can change the direction of gravity at will within the affected area

rigorous.name: Rigorous
rigorous.description: Ever wished you could give someone a taste of their own medicine, but like, literally? Rigorous is like having a magical "I'm rubber, you're glue" shield.
rigorous.effect: Reflects debuffs and negative conditions back to the caster.

scaling.level 5: Duration increases to 2 rounds
scaling.level 10: Also grants resistance to the reflected effect
scaling.level 15: Can choose to reflect or absorb the effect

secondChance.name: Second Chance
secondChance.description: Ever wanted to be the necromancer equivalent of a little league coach? Second Chance is like running a daycare for the recently deceased!
secondChance.effect: Raises a lower-level monster from the dead as an undead minion.

scaling.level 5: Can raise creatures up to 5 levels higher than caster
scaling.level 10: Raised creatures retain more of their original abilities
scaling.level 15: Can raise multiple creatures at once

selfImmolation.name: Self-Immolation
selfImmolation.description: Casts a non-static sphere of Sheol Fire around the caster with a 1-foot buffer from all body parts of caster.
selfImmolation.effect: Surrounds the caster with an extremely destructive fire.
selfImmolation.range: Self (1.5 meters per level, up to level 15)
selfImmolation.damage: Extreme fire damage to everything in range

scaling.level 5: Can control the shape of the fire
scaling.level 10: Fire can selectively avoid allies
scaling.level 15: Range increases exponentially and becomes fully controllable

shatter.name: Shatter
shatter.description: Any attack that lands upon the object imbued with this enchantment has a 1.5% chance to disarm the opponent.
shatter.effect: Enchants an object to potentially disarm attackers.

scaling.level 5: Increase disarm chance to 3%
scaling.level 10: Increase chance of weapon breaking or transferring to 10% each
scaling.level 15: Can affect multiple objects at once

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Ever wanted to cosplay as a turtle, but without the slow movement and weird shell tan lines? Shield is like having your own personal bubble boy suit, but instead of protecting you from germs, it's saving your bacon from angry pointy things!
shield.effect: Creates a protective barrier around the caster that moves with them.

scaling.level 5: Shield also provides resistance to elemental damage
scaling.level 10: Can extend shield to protect one nearby ally
scaling.level 15: Shield can reflect some damage back to attacker

skedaddle.name: Skedaddle
skedaddle.description: Ever been at a party and suddenly remembered you left the magical oven on? Skedaddle is like having a "Get Out of Awkward Situation Free" card, but for your whole group!
skedaddle.effect: Teleports the group to a random location they've been within the last hour.

scaling.level 5: Can choose from three random locations
scaling.level 10: Extend time frame to locations visited in last 24 hours
scaling.level 15: Can bring one additional non-party member

suppuratingEye.name: Suppurating Eye
suppuratingEye.description: Ever wanted to be the ultimate peeping tom, but with more ooze and less legal consequences? Suppurating Eye is like having a really gross, really effective spy camera!
suppuratingEye.effect: Creates a remote viewing sensor from the caster's bodily fluid.
suppuratingEye.range: Sight and sound from fluid location

scaling.level 5: Can hear thoughts of creatures near the fluid
scaling.level 10: Can cast spells through the fluid location
scaling.level 15: Can create multiple eyes simultaneously

teleporttoStairwell.name: Teleport to Stairwell
teleporttoStairwell.description: Stuck in the dungeon's eternal IKEA and can't find the exit? Teleport to Stairwell is like having a magical "You Are Here" map, except the "You" part is more of a suggestion than a fact.
teleporttoStairwell.effect: Teleports the caster to a chosen exit.

scaling.level 20: Can bring along up to 5 allies

torch.name: Torch
torch.description: Who needs a flashlight when you can have a personal, floating sun? Torch is like having a loyal firefly the size of a basketball!
torch.effect: Creates a floating orb of light that follows the caster.
torch.range: 20-foot radius of bright light, 20 additional feet of dim light
torch.damage: N/A (except to vampires at higher levels)

scaling.level 5: Can adjust brightness and color of light
scaling.level 10: Can send light orb up to 60 feet away
scaling.level 13: Can stun vampires and set their heads aflame

tripper.name: Tripper
tripper.description: A lot of people say crawlers who use this spell are chickenshit cowards. But then again, those same people are sitting at home covered in Cheeto mud watching this show while wearing pajamas.
tripper.effect: Triggers all traps in a certain radius.

scaling.level 5: Can choose which type of traps to trigger
scaling.level 10: Can redirect some trap effects
scaling.level 15: Can create temporary magical traps in addition to triggering existing ones

twinkleToes.name: Twinkle Toes
twinkleToes.description: Ever wished your lumbering golem moved less like a rusty garbage truck and more like a caffeinated squirrel? Twinkle Toes is like strapping rocket skates to your minions!
twinkleToes.effect: Dramatically increases a minion's movement speed.

scaling.level 5: Also increases minion's Dexterity for the duration
scaling.level 10: Can affect up to three minions at once
scaling.level 15: Minions can run on vertical surfaces and water for the duration

wallofFire.name: Wall of Fire
wallofFire.description: Ever wanted to recreate that "This is fine" meme in real life? Wall of Fire is like drawing a line in the sand, if the line was made of "NOPE" and the sand was highly flammable!
wallofFire.effect: Creates a wall of magical fire that damages creatures passing through it.

scaling.level 5: Wall can be up to 20 feet high and 60 feet long
scaling.level 10: Damage increases to 7d8, and the wall ignites flammable objects
scaling.level 15: Can shape the wall into a ring or dome

waterLily.name: Water Lily
waterLily.description: Looking for a way to make your enemies take a permanent nap? Water Lily is like the magical version of a really intense, never-ending ASMR session!
waterLily.effect: Renders the target unconscious until the caster cancels the spell or dies.
waterLily.damage: N/A (but target takes damage if moved)

scaling.level 5: Can affect targets up to 30 feet away
scaling.level 10: Can put multiple targets to sleep simultaneously
scaling.level 15: Sleeping target is surrounded by a damaging water barrier

whyAreYouHittingYourself.name: Why Are You Hitting Yourself
whyAreYouHittingYourself.description: Ever wanted to recreate that classic big sibling move, but with magic? Why Are You Hitting Yourself is like being a puppet master, but the puppet is your enemy and the show is a slapstick comedy!
whyAreYouHittingYourself.effect: Forces the target to attack themselves.
whyAreYouHittingYourself.damage: Varies based on target's own attack

scaling.level 5: Duration increases to 2 rounds
scaling.level 10: Can affect multiple targets
scaling.level 15: Target uses their most powerful ability on themselves

wingsofthePixie.name: Wings of the Pixie
wingsofthePixie.description: Ever wanted to make a dramatic exit that's equal parts majestic and mischievous? Wings of the Pixie is like strapping a jet pack to a glitter bomb!
wingsofthePixie.effect: Grants the caster temporary flight and a speed boost.

scaling.level 5: Leave a trail of disorienting pixie dust behind you as you fly
scaling.level 10: Can carry one additional creature while flying
scaling.level 15: Gain the ability to teleport short distances while the wings are active

wispArmor.name: Wisp Armor
wispArmor.description: Surrounds your body with tendrils of light. While ineffective against physical attacks, this spell negates 75% of incoming damage from magic-based attacks.
wispArmor.effect: Creates a protective layer of light that defends against magic and mind control.

scaling.level 5: Also provides a slight physical damage reduction
scaling.level 10: Can extend the effect to one nearby ally
scaling.level 15: Reflects 25% of negated magic damage back to the attacker

zerzura.name: Zerzura
zerzura.description: Ever felt like your whole town could use a change of scenery? Zerzura is like playing a cosmic game of Monopoly, but instead of houses, you're moving entire settlements!
zerzura.effect: Teleports an entire settlement to a random location on a lower floor.
zerzura.range: Affects an entire city or town
zerzura.damage: N/A (but creates powerful revenants where it lands)
zerzura.cooldown: Can only be cast once at the end of a floor

scaling.level 10: Can choose from three potential landing spots
scaling.level 20: Can bring along some surrounding territory

woolenWhisper.name: Woolen Whisper
woolenWhisper.description: Harness the cozy essence of alpaca yarn, muffling your footsteps and calming nearby allies with a soft lull.
woolenWhisper.effect: Temporarily reduce the sound you and your allies make, granting Stealth bonuses and minor morale boosts.

scaling.level 5: Radius increases to 15 feet; allies gain +2 to Stealth checks.
scaling.level 10: Further increases radius to 20 feet; muffles minor spells cast within range, imposing disadvantage on enemy Perception checks.
scaling.level 15: Woolen aura neutralizes non-magical sonic effects in the area for the duration.

serpentStrike.name: Serpent Strike
serpentStrike.description: Manifest a spectral serpent coiling around your limbs, ready to lash out at foes with lightning speed.
serpentStrike.effect: Instantly extend your reach or deliver a biting psychic snap to your target.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 4d6; target must make a Wit save or be momentarily dazed.
scaling.level 10: Range extends to 20 feet; gains a chance to poison (1d6 additional damage on failed Stamina save).
scaling.level 15: Attack can fork into two separate strikes against two different targets.

stickyTrap.name: Sticky Trap
stickyTrap.description: Throw out a sticky web-like pattern on the ground, immobilizing those who step in it for a comedic (or tragic) scene.
stickyTrap.effect: Creates a 10-foot webbed area that traps enemies who fail a Dexterity save.

scaling.level 5: Area increases to 15 feet; entrapped foes also suffer –2 to Attack rolls while stuck.
scaling.level 10: Webbing becomes tougher, requiring two successful saves to break free.
scaling.level 15: Webs become partially sentient, creeping to re-entangle foes who escape (foes must succeed on an additional save).

shadowStep.name: Shadow Step
shadowStep.description: Meld with the darkness, slipping between shadows like a wraith on a coffee run.
shadowStep.effect: Teleport from one area of dim light or darkness to another within range, remaining partially hidden afterward.
shadowStep.range: Up to 40 feet between connected shadows

scaling.level 5: Extend range to 60 feet; gain advantage on your first attack after emerging.
scaling.level 10: Emerge invisible for 1 round or until you attack.
scaling.level 15: Shadow Step can be used twice before incurring the cooldown.

dustScatter.name: Dust Scatter
dustScatter.description: Release an explosion of glittering fae dust that blinds foes and momentarily turns you into a swirling swirl of sparkles.
dustScatter.effect: Enemies in range must make a Wit save or be blinded for 1 round. You briefly become incorporeal while scattering.

scaling.level 5: Radius increases to 20 feet; blinded foes also lose 10 movement speed on a failed save.
scaling.level 10: Incorporeal effect lasts 1 full round, during which you take half damage from physical sources.
scaling.level 15: Enemies remain blinded for 2 rounds on a failed save, or 1 round on a successful one.

fashionShield.name: Fashion Shield
fashionShield.description: Summon a shimmering barrier of sheer style that deflects attacks and leaves foes questioning their outfit choices.
fashionShield.effect: Grant yourself a moderate protective field that absorbs damage.

scaling.level 5: Shield grants +3 AR for 1 round.
scaling.level 10: Upon activation, blind attackers with a flash of fashion, imposing disadvantage on their next attack.
scaling.level 15: Shield persists for 2 rounds, and you can reflect a small portion (1d6) of the absorbed damage back.

wingstorm.name: Wingstorm
wingstorm.description: Fluttering wings spin into a whirlwind of color and force, scattering foes like leaves in a gale.
wingstorm.effect: Creates a gust that knocks back enemies in a cone and deals minor damage.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 3d6; knocked foes are also prone on a failed Strength save.
scaling.level 10: Cone extends to 30 feet, and the whirlwind can curve once.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 4d6; foes in light armor or less are lifted 10 feet into the air.

dragonMaul.name: Dragon Maul
dragonMaul.description: Summon the furious spirit of a draconic maw, snapping at your enemies with fiery hunger.
dragonMaul.effect: A conjured dragon’s head emerges to clamp down on a target in melee range.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 6d6; target must make a Strength save or be grappled.
scaling.level 10: Maul can strike twice in one casting if the first hits, but the second does half damage.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 7d6, and if the target is reduced to 0 HP, it bursts into dragonfire dealing 3d6 to adjacent foes.

thunderCrash.name: Thunder Crash
thunderCrash.description: You clap your greaves together (or stomp), summoning a rolling thunderbolt that crushes your enemies’ eardrums and dignity.
thunderCrash.effect: Deals sonic damage in an area, potentially stunning those caught within.

scaling.level 5: Radius increases to 30 feet; stunned foes remain stunned for 1 round if they fail a Wit save.
scaling.level 10: Damage increases to 5d8; environment objects in range may shatter at GM’s discretion.
scaling.level 15: You can selectively exempt allies from the crash effect.

eldritchWave.name: Eldritch Wave
eldritchWave.description: Tear open a small portal to the Abyss, releasing a wave of writhing, dark energy that creeps across the ground.
eldritchWave.effect: Deals necrotic damage to enemies in a line and may inflict fear.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 5d6; foes must make a Wit save or be frightened for 1 round.
scaling.level 10: Wave can split into two 15-foot lines at different angles.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 6d6; frightened foes take an additional 1d6 psychic damage each round they remain frightened.

phoenixDive.name: Phoenix Dive
phoenixDive.description: Channel fiery plumage to leap into the air and crash back down with explosive flair, roasting foes around you.
phoenixDive.effect: Launch yourself up to 20 feet and land in a fiery burst, dealing area fire damage.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 5d6; radius increases to 15 feet.
scaling.level 10: You can hover for 1 round before diving, evading melee attacks.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 6d6; you heal for half the total fire damage dealt if at least one foe is hit.

salvationBarrier.name: Salvation Barrier
salvationBarrier.description: Conjure a radiant barrier that stands defiant against harm, reflecting your unwavering vow to protect the innocent.
salvationBarrier.effect: Forms a protective wall or dome of light, blocking a wide range of attacks.
salvationBarrier.range: Up to 30 feet wide or a 15-foot dome

scaling.level 5: Barrier gains 50% chance to reflect non-magical projectiles back at attackers.
scaling.level 10: Can extend barrier’s duration up to 1 minute. Magical projectiles are partially deflected.
scaling.level 15: Barrier also purifies the area inside, removing low-level curses or debuffs at GM’s discretion.

venomGenesis.name: Venom Genesis
venomGenesis.description: Spawn a potent toxin derived from Scolopendra’s final tier, coating your weapon or body in lethal poison.
venomGenesis.effect: Any successful hit deals additional poison damage and can inflict a lingering poison effect.

scaling.level 5: Poison damage increases to 3d6; inflicts disadvantage on foes’ Stamina saves for 1 round.
scaling.level 10: Poison lasts for 3 successful hits before it fades.
scaling.level 15: Any foe reduced to 0 HP while under this poison disintegrates, preventing resurrection or typical recovery.

heavenPiercer.name: Heaven Piercer
heavenPiercer.description: Summon a spiraling lance of pure energy, launching it skyward (or downward) to rattle the very firmament.
heavenPiercer.effect: Penetrating beam attack that deals heavy force damage and can punch through obstacles.
heavenPiercer.range: Up to 60 feet in a straight line

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 6d8; can pierce up to 1 foot of solid rock or metal.
scaling.level 10: Extend range to 90 feet; any creature behind the first target takes half damage.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 7d8; the lance splits into two beams at the end, potentially hitting another target in range.

moonlightFrenzy.name: Moonlight Frenzy
moonlightFrenzy.description: Under the moon’s silent gaze, unleash a savage blitz fueled by primal lunar energies.
moonlightFrenzy.effect: Boost your melee speed and ferocity for a short time, dealing extra damage and possibly inflicting fear.

scaling.level 5: Extra damage increases to 3d6; gain advantage on Strength checks.
scaling.level 10: Attacks have a chance (50%) to knock foes prone.
scaling.level 15: You can continue the frenzy for up to 2 rounds without additional cost, and frightened foes cannot approach you.

cinderellaClock.name: Cinderella Clock
cinderellaClock.description: A spectral timepiece hovers, tolling midnight as fate unravels around your chosen target.
cinderellaClock.effect: Briefly halt or skew time for a single target, delaying their actions or reversing a minor effect.

scaling.level 5: Target must make a Wit save or lose their next action.
scaling.level 10: You can choose to revert a small event (like a missed attack or a partial movement) up to 6 seconds ago.
scaling.level 15: Spell can affect up to two targets simultaneously, each requiring separate saves.

skyBreaker.name: Sky Breaker
skyBreaker.description: Gather momentum with your colossal wings, then divebomb or surge upward, fracturing the air with raw force.
skyBreaker.effect: Create a massive shockwave in the air, damaging or knocking flying foes out of the sky.

scaling.level 5: Damage increases to 5d8; grounded foes in radius must make a Strength save or be knocked prone.
scaling.level 10: Radius increases to 50 feet; you can remain airborne for an extra round without spending movement.
scaling.level 15: Damage increases to 6d8; you can target a specific flying foe within 100 feet, forcing them to land forcibly.

arcaneVault.name: Arcane Vault
arcaneVault.description: Unleash a swirling vortex of fae magic that stores your attacks’ energy, releasing it in a singular devastating burst.
arcaneVault.effect: Absorb a portion of damage dealt by you for a short duration, then release it in one shot.
arcaneVault.range: Self (release can target up to 30 feet away)
arcaneVault.castingTime: 1 bonus action to activate, 1 action to release

scaling.level 5: Store up to 10 points of damage, release deals +2d6 force.
scaling.level 10: Store up to 20 points, release deals +4d6 force in a 10-foot radius.
scaling.level 15: Store up to 30 points, release deals +6d6 force and knocks foes prone on a failed Strength save.

multiMonarchEdict.name: Multi Monarch Edict
multiMonarchEdict.description: Amplify the chorus of nine regal voices, each issuing a decree that confounds or binds your enemies.
multiMonarchEdict.effect: Up to nine targets must obey partial commands or suffer confusion if they resist.

scaling.level 5: Each target must make a Wit save or be mildly confused for 1 round (cannot take reactions).
scaling.level 10: Targets that fail their save are fully confused (like a Confusion spell) for 1 round.
scaling.level 15: You may choose different directives for each target (like freeze, kneel, drop items), lasting up to 2 rounds if they fail consecutive saves.

eventHorizonHide.name: Event Horizon Hide
eventHorizonHide.description: Conjure a minuscule gravity well, warping light around you so you appear as a living shadow—practically unnoticeable.
eventHorizonHide.effect: Heavy concealment or near-invisibility, plus minor gravitational distortion around you.

scaling.level 5: Gain advantage on Stealth checks; project a 5-foot aura that slightly slows enemies’ movement.
scaling.level 10: Invisibility improves to near total, enemies have disadvantage on Perception checks to detect you; aura radius extends to 10 feet.
scaling.level 15: You and up to one ally within 5 feet can step into the event horizon, both gaining near-invisibility and the slowing aura for the duration.
